pull_request.title: Fix log_action data loss due to signed int32 overflow
pull_request.body: When idaction exceeds signed int32 max (2147483647) - the temp table in "createTempTableForStoringUsedActions()" cannot store the idactions anymore and thus still used log_action rows will get deleted.

repo.description: Liberating Web Analytics. Star us on Github? +1. Piwik is the leading open alternative to Google Analytics that gives you full control over your data. comment.body: So with this safeguard here for the headers, are we no longer setting the http error code in tests and only relying on the exception? That might be ok, just want to confirm if I understand the change right.

pull_request.title: Run Matomo in PHP 8.3
pull_request.body:
### Description:

A few changes to get this working:

- Add support for prerelease versions in version test.
- Reserialise test data to avoid error `unserialize(): Extra data starting at offset`  ([see here](https://php.watch/versions/8.3/unserialize-E-WARNING))
- There was a bug in previous versions of PHP where `http_response_code` wouldn't throw a warning if headers already sent, now it does. I've added a workaround for now until we can properly handle setting response codes rather than doing it directly deep in code, ([see here](https://github.com/php/php-src/issues/10742)) 

### Review

* [ ] [Functional review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#functional-review-done)
* [ ] [Potential edge cases thought about](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#potential-edge-cases-thought-about) (behavior of the code with strange input, with strange internal state or possible interactions with other Matomo subsystems)
* [ ] [Usability review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#usability-review-done) (is anything maybe unclear or think about anything that would cause people to reach out to support)
* [ ] [Security review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/security-in-piwik#checklist)
* [ ] [Wording review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#translations-wording-review-done)
* [ ] [Code review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#code-review-done)
* [ ] [Tests were added if useful/possible](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#tests-were-added-if-usefulpossible)
* [ ] [Reviewed for breaking changes](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#reviewed-for-breaking-changes)
* [ ] [Developer changelog updated if needed](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#developer-changelog-updated-if-needed)
* [ ] [Documentation added if needed](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#documentation-added-if-needed)
* [ ] Existing documentation updated if needed

issue.title: All Visits Segment filter not showing options

labels.name: Waiting for user feedback
labels.description: Indicates the Matomo team is waiting for feedback from the author or other users.

labels.name: Potential Bug
labels.description: Something that might be a bug, but can't be reproduced (yet).

labels.name: To Triage
labels.description: An issue awaiting triage by a Matomo core team member

issue.body: When in the Visitors > Organisation Name tab, I can see a list of the 33 organisation names, with activity against each (i.e visits etc). When I create a segment in the All Visits filter, and filter by Organisation Name, in the dropdown list only 26 results are shown, and when I search for the 7 org names that are not shown there are no results. I have also tried filtering by the org ID and the IP address of the user in that org but there are not results. This means at the moment I cannot create segments for my sales team by their organisations, as not all organisations can be filtered by

comment.body:
Hey,

No they've not got any accents or special characters in, and don't appear
as you type their names. We've also got organisation ID as well, but the
same thing occurs with that too, which is odd as its just an integer. It's
the same orgs not showing each time, but as mentioned they do appear under
both the visitor reports that show by org name and org ID. In the segment
filter, I type in Organisation Name to find the field, and there's only
one, we've not duplicated the field by accident

On Fri, 27 Oct 2023 at 03:32, Ben Burgess ***@***.***> wrote:

> Hi @Dyber1 <https://github.com/Dyber1>, thanks for reaching out.
>
> The Organisation Name you see under the Visitors menu will be provided by
> a custom dimension, as organisation is not a standard dimension in Matomo.
> Is there anything different about the missing 7 organisation names, such as
> names containing quotes or accented characters? Even if an organisation
> name is not provided in the segment editor drop down it should still be
> possible to type the exact value, could you check if this works for you?
>
> —
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/matomo-org/matomo/issues/21416#issuecomment-1782193188>,
> or unsubscribe
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/A5KM3CVC6ZB4QVBRLT4KCKTYBMMM3AVCNFSM6AAAAAA6HFCX7SVHI2DSMVQWIX3LMV43OSLTON2WKQ3PNVWWK3TUHMYTOOBSGE4TGMJYHA>
> .
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID:
> ***@***.***>
>

issue.title: [Bug]: Matomo Times out if it cannot reach 199.232.170.132

labels.name: Potential Bug
labels.description: Something that might be a bug, but can't be reproduced (yet).

labels.name: To Triage
labels.description: An issue awaiting triage by a Matomo core team member

issue.body:
### What happened?

We have an IDPS that dynamically drops suspicious connexion attempts. 
Matomo seems to try to reach 199.232.170.132 on port 80. If this get's dropped, Matomo's web GUI will timeout for any request.
I wasn't able to pinpoint the original domain that Matomo attempts to reach, but the IP would be different depending on how the that domain resolves at any given time.

### What should happen?

Matomo should not assume that 
* internet is available, 
* any specific IP is available

It should work properly if after a few seconds it cannot reach an external service/domain. 

### How can this be reproduced?

drop traffic to 199.232.170.132 or whatever IP matomo is trying to reach

### Matomo Version

Matomo 4

### Matomo Patch or Minor Version

4.15.1

### PHP Version

8.2

### Server Operating System

Debian 12.2

### What browsers are you seeing the problem on?

Not applicable (e.g. an API call etc.)

### Computer Operating System

Not relevant

### Relevant log output

_No response_

### Validations

- [X] Read our [Contributing Guidelines](https://github.com/matomo-org/matomo/blob/5.x-dev/CONTRIBUTING.md).
- [X] Follow our [Security Policy](https://github.com/matomo-org/matomo/blob/5.x-dev/SECURITY.md).
- [X] Check that there isn't already an issue that reports the same bug to avoid creating duplicates.
- [X] The provided steps to reproduce is a [minimal reproducible](https://stackoverflow.com/help/minimal-reproducible-example) of the Bug.

commits.message: Update tests/PHPUnit/Unit/DbHelperTest.php

comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -74,6 +74,7 @@ public function getTestQueries()
             ['SELECT  /*+ MAX_EXECUTION_TIME(1500) */  * FROM table', 'SELECT * FROM table', 1.5],
             ['SELECT  /*+ MAX_EXECUTION_TIME(20000) */  column FROM (SELECT * FROM table)', 'SELECT column FROM (SELECT * FROM table)', 20],
             ['SELECT * FROM table', 'SELECT * FROM table', 0],
+            ['SELECT /*+ MAX_EXECUTION_TIME(1000) */ * FROM table', 'SELECT /*+ MAX_EXECUTION_TIME(1000) */ * FROM table', 3.5], //Should not append MAX_EXECUTION_TIME as 3500 if already present
comment.body:
```suggestion
            ['SELECT /*+ MAX_EXECUTION_TIME(1000) */ * FROM table', 'SELECT /*+ MAX_EXECUTION_TIME(1000) */ * FROM table', 3.5], // should not append/change MAX_EXECUTION_TIME if already present
```

Matomo lets you easily collect data from websites & apps and visualise this data and extract insights. Privacy is built-in. We love Pull Requests!

pull_request.title: Added code to not add MaxExecutionTimeHintToQuery if already present
pull_request.body:
### Description:

Added code to not add MaxExecutionTimeHintToQuery if already present
Fixes: #PG-3106

### Review

* [ ] [Functional review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#functional-review-done)
* [ ] [Potential edge cases thought about](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#potential-edge-cases-thought-about) (behavior of the code with strange input, with strange internal state or possible interactions with other Matomo subsystems)
* [ ] [Usability review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#usability-review-done) (is anything maybe unclear or think about anything that would cause people to reach out to support)
* [ ] [Security review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/security-in-piwik#checklist)
* [ ] [Wording review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#translations-wording-review-done)
* [ ] [Code review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#code-review-done)
* [ ] [Tests were added if useful/possible](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#tests-were-added-if-usefulpossible)
* [ ] [Reviewed for breaking changes](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#reviewed-for-breaking-changes)
* [ ] [Developer changelog updated if needed](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#developer-changelog-updated-if-needed)
* [ ] [Documentation added if needed](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#documentation-added-if-needed)
* [ ] Existing documentation updated if needed

comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -74,6 +74,7 @@ public function getTestQueries()
             ['SELECT  /*+ MAX_EXECUTION_TIME(1500) */  * FROM table', 'SELECT * FROM table', 1.5],
             ['SELECT  /*+ MAX_EXECUTION_TIME(20000) */  column FROM (SELECT * FROM table)', 'SELECT column FROM (SELECT * FROM table)', 20],
             ['SELECT * FROM table', 'SELECT * FROM table', 0],
+            ['SELECT /*+ MAX_EXECUTION_TIME(1000) */ * FROM table', 'SELECT /*+ MAX_EXECUTION_TIME(1000) */ * FROM table', 3.5], //Should not append MAX_EXECUTION_TIME as 3500 if already present
comment.body: Right, ok, thanks. Now I see the number actually doesn't matter in this particular test, can be anything.

commits.message: Use 4.x correct Container interface

Add premium plugin menu items to professional services [4.x] (#21394)

* Add premium plugin menu items to professional services

* Add blank line eof

* Turn promo widgets off

* Improve test name

* Update PromoWidgetApplicable to not depend on static calls

* Fix broken unit test

* Fix broken integration test
Add blank line eof
Turn promo widgets off
Add initial template for plugin promos
Move image to Card so grid can be used at card level
Add plugin promo screenshots
Adjust content
Use widget template instead of controller view
Populate plugin promo content
Remove enable/disable variable override
Remove legal info markup as not yet designed
Unify image alt text and remove help url property
Prepare promo widgets for refactoring for reusability
Integrate CTA links
Rename A/B Testing image to match plugin name
Use marketplace plugin info where possible
Update Start free trial CTA to open marketplace in new tab
Move promo features text to lang file
Add UI tests
Update UI test screenshots from CI

issue.title: [Bug]: Fatal error: Cannot access offset of type string on string in SitesManager/API.php

labels.name: Potential Bug
labels.description: Something that might be a bug, but can't be reproduced (yet).

labels.name: To Triage
labels.description: An issue awaiting triage by a Matomo core team member

issue.body:
### What happened?

This fatal error happened on 4.15.2-b1

> Error: {"message":"Cannot access offset of type string on string","file":"\/plugins\/SitesManager\/API.php","line":766,"request_id":"c53e5","backtrace":" on \/plugins\/SitesManager\/API.php(766)\n#0 \/plugins\/SitesManager\/API.php(1371): Piwik\\Plugins\\SitesManager\\API->setSettingValue('urls', NULL, Array, Array)\n#1 [internal function]: Piwik\\Plugins\\SitesManager\\API->updateSite('11', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, Array, NULL, NULL)\n#2 \/core\/API\/Proxy.php(244): call_user_func_array(Array, Array)\n#3 \/core\/Context.php(28): Piwik\\API\\Proxy->Piwik\\API\\{closure}()\n#4 \/core\/API\/Proxy.php(335): Piwik\\Context::executeWithQueryParameters(Array, Object(Closure))\n#5 \/core\/API\/Request.php(267): Piwik\\API\\Proxy->call('\\\\Piwik\\\\Plugins\\\\...', 'updateSite', Array)\n#6 \/plugins\/API\/Controller.php(45): Piwik\\API\\Request->process()\n#7 [internal function]: Piwik\\Plugins\\API\\Controller->index()\n#8 \/core\/FrontController.php(637): call_user_func_array(Array, Array)\n#9 \/core\/FrontController.php(169): Piwik\\FrontController->doDispatch('API', false, Array)\n#10 \/core\/dispatch.php(32): Piwik\\FrontController->dispatch()\n#11 \/index.php(25): require_once('\/c...')\n#12 {main}","safemode_backtrace":"#0 [internal function]: Piwik\\Plugins\\Cloud\\Controller->safemode(Array)\n#1 \/core\/FrontController.php(637): call_user_func_array(Array, Array)\n#2 \/core\/FrontController.php(169): Piwik\\FrontController->doDispatch('Cloud', 'safemode', Array)\n#3 \/core\/FrontController.php(100): Piwik\\FrontController->dispatch('CorePluginsAdmi...', 'safemode', Array)\n#4 \/core\/FrontController.php(140): Piwik\\FrontController::(Array)\n#5 \/core\/FrontController.php(196): Piwik\\FrontController::(Object(TypeError))\n#6 \/core\/dispatch.php(32): Piwik\\FrontController->dispatch()\n#7 \/index.php(25): require_once('\/c...')\n#8 {main}"}

> URL: /?method=SitesManager.updateSite&idSite=11&parameters=undefined&module=API&format=json&settingValues%5BWebsiteMeasurable%5D%5B%5Bobject+Object%5D%5D%5Bvalue%5D=0

> Referrer:

### What should happen?

No error

### How can this be reproduced?

Unclear. See stack trace in "what happened"

### Matomo Version

Matomo 4

### Matomo Patch or Minor Version

15

### PHP Version

.

### Server Operating System

.

### What browsers are you seeing the problem on?

_No response_

### Computer Operating System

.

### Relevant log output

_No response_

### Validations

- [X] Read our [Contributing Guidelines](https://github.com/matomo-org/matomo/blob/5.x-dev/CONTRIBUTING.md).
- [X] Follow our [Security Policy](https://github.com/matomo-org/matomo/blob/5.x-dev/SECURITY.md).
- [X] Check that there isn't already an issue that reports the same bug to avoid creating duplicates.
- [X] The provided steps to reproduce is a [minimal reproducible](https://stackoverflow.com/help/minimal-reproducible-example) of the Bug.

comment.body: This looks like it might be caused by trying to set the urls for a measurable to null. There is a [related issue](https://github.com/matomo-org/matomo/issues/20057) which could potentially resolve this.

issue.title: [Bug]: Metrics are disappearing in the graph in custom reports

labels.name: Potential Bug
labels.description: Something that might be a bug, but can't be reproduced (yet).

labels.name: To Triage
labels.description: An issue awaiting triage by a Matomo core team member

issue.body:
### What happened?

In the custom reports, I have a problem with the custom metrics displayed the graphs.
When the graph is loaded, I have all the metrics that I asked for as it should be.

However, as soon as I want to unbox one of the metrics so that it won't be displayed in my graph anymore, several metrics are erased at the same time.

If I want to get my metrics back, I have to reload the page.

Example: What I have at the beginning
![Bug metrics rapport matomo](https://github.com/matomo-org/matomo/assets/143426708/c442542f-7fbd-419d-af7d-48e943f75c09)

When I unbox one of the metrics:
![Bug metrics rapport matomo 2](https://github.com/matomo-org/matomo/assets/143426708/371215be-4b68-494d-a40d-c29e25496db1)


### What should happen?

I should be able to unbox one metric and keep all the others in my graph.
Moreover, I should be able to unbox a metric, and then check it once again in the list if I want it back on my graph, without having to reload the page.

### How can this be reproduced?

Go to a cutom report with a multiple metrics graph in Matomo and try unboxing some metrics.
Check whether you have only one metric disappearing or not

### Matomo Version

Matomo 4

### Matomo Patch or Minor Version

4.15.1

### PHP Version

N/A

### Server Operating System

N/A

### What browsers are you seeing the problem on?

_No response_

### Computer Operating System

Windows 10

### Relevant log output

_No response_

### Validations

- [X] Read our [Contributing Guidelines](https://github.com/matomo-org/matomo/blob/5.x-dev/CONTRIBUTING.md).
- [X] Follow our [Security Policy](https://github.com/matomo-org/matomo/blob/5.x-dev/SECURITY.md).
- [X] Check that there isn't already an issue that reports the same bug to avoid creating duplicates.
- [X] The provided steps to reproduce is a [minimal reproducible](https://stackoverflow.com/help/minimal-reproducible-example) of the Bug.

comment.body: Hi @Chaprou, thank you for creating this issue. In this issue tracker we only manage issues for Matomo core. For premium feature related inquiries please email our support at shop@innocraft.com. Thank you for you understanding and sorry for the inconvenience.

issue.body:
### What happened?

In the custom reports, I have a problem with the custom metrics displayed the graphs.
When the graph is loaded, I have all the metrics that I asked for as it should be.

However, as soon as I want to unbox one of the metrics so that it won't be displayed in my graph anymore, several metrics are erased at the same time.

### How can this be reproduced?

Check whether you have only one metric disappearing or not

pull_request.title: [Vue] make all scripts load via defer
pull_request.body:
### Description:

**This PR is based off #19502.**

Fixes https://github.com/matomo-org/matomo/issues/18982.

Changes:
* All JS assets are included w/ the `defer` attribute.
* wrap uses of `$(document).ready(` in inline `<script>`s w/ `window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',` (or just replaced some).
* In `development:compute-js-asset-size` command, also printing total size of vanilla JS (non-Vue code) by plugin.
* Introduce `CoreHome.DataTable` directive to initialize datatables instead of inline scripts. Similarly added LegacyUIControl directive for _uiControl.twig files, and similar directives for UserCountryMap widgets.
* Fix some exception messages in piwikHelper.js (messages referencing vue-entry changed to vue-directive).
* Introduce `UserCountryMapLegacyModule` to house vanilla JS objects related to realtime/visitor map. `UserCountryMap` shouldn't be used since it is also the name of a plugin w/ Vue code.

### Review

* [ ] [Functional review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#functional-review-done)
* [ ] [Potential edge cases thought about](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#potential-edge-cases-thought-about) (behavior of the code with strange input, with strange internal state or possible interactions with other Matomo subsystems)
* [ ] [Usability review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#usability-review-done) (is anything maybe unclear or think about anything that would cause people to reach out to support)
* [ ] [Security review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/security-in-piwik#checklist)
* [ ] [Wording review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#translations-wording-review-done)
* [ ] [Code review done](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#code-review-done)
* [ ] [Tests were added if useful/possible](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#tests-were-added-if-usefulpossible)
* [ ] [Reviewed for breaking changes](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#reviewed-for-breaking-changes)
* [ ] [Developer changelog updated if needed](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#developer-changelog-updated-if-needed)
* [ ] [Documentation added if needed](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/pull-request-reviews#documentation-added-if-needed)
* [ ] Existing documentation updated if needed
